question: Which state has emerged as the topper in implementing PM SVANidhi scheme?
explanation:
The Government of Uttar Pradesh has emerged as the topper in implementing PM Street Vendors Atmanirbhar Nidhi Scheme (SVANidhi Scheme). The state has been ranked No.1 in number of applications, sanctions and disbursements.
The PM SVANidhi scheme was launched by the Central Government on June1, 2020 to give financial assistance to urban street vendors during the Covid 19 pandemic.
